title: Medieval.Total.War.Gold.v2.01.REPACK-vol1
description:
Medieval.Total.War.Gold.v2.01.REPACK-vol1

Medieval 1 Total War Gold v2.01 including the add-on Viking Invasion. This repack uses the DirectDraw wrapper from Sepheus to bypass the 2GB+ RAM bug, which locks the game resolution to the lowest value.

If you experience frequent crashes (especially when starting a new campaign), try copying the files button_ipnext.BIF and button_ipprev.bif, which are located in the main game folder, to the folder campmapbuttons.


1. Mount or unpack .iso
2. Install
3. Play
